mapper.sql: select p.id, p.tenant_id, p.tag, p.title, p.description, p.difficulty, p.key_path, p.category, p.video_id, p.create_dept, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark from problem p

select p.id, p.tenant_id, p.exam_id, p.title, p.description, p.difficulty, p.key_path, p.category, p.video_id, p.max_score, p.create_dept, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark from problem p join exam e on p.exam_id = e.id
mapper.select: WITH LatestSubmission AS ( SELECT s.problem_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY s.problem_id ORDER BY s.create_time DESC ) AS row_num FROM submission s ${ew.getCustomSqlSegment} ) SELECT p.id, p.tenant_id, p.tag, p.title, p.description, p.difficulty, p.key_path, p.category, p.video_id, p.create_dept, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark, CASE WHEN ls.problem_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS resolved FROM problem p LEFT JOIN LatestSubmission ls ON p.id = ls.problem_id AND ls.row_num = 1;
